Hi all - 

Silly thing to be pondering late night before driving to Tampa, but...I'm curious about a red lacquer attribution on a little hirazukuri ko-wakizashi that's here. It looks like it's an attribution to Shintogo Kuni--- (not mitsu?) and the ura seems to be a Honami inscription. Anybody care to translate this inscription tonight??? Poor sword has been sandpapered but is in interesting kinko fitted mounts. If not Kunimitsu, who then???  Just a last ditch exercise that would be nice to solve. 

Ron
STL
